DataSource.Query: SELECT inventory.suppliers.supplier_id, CASE WHEN COALESCE(inventory.suppliers.supplier_name, '') = '' THEN inventory.suppliers.company_name ELSE inventory.suppliers.supplier_name END as supplier, inventory.suppliers.company_country AS country, SUM((price * quantity) - discount + tax) AS amount FROM inventory.verified_checkout_details_view INNER JOIN purchase.purchases ON inventory.verified_checkout_details_view.checkout_id = purchase.purchases.checkout_id INNER JOIN inventory.suppliers ON purchase.purchases.supplier_id = inventory.suppliers.supplier_id GROUP BY inventory.suppliers.supplier_id, inventory.suppliers.supplier_name, inventory.suppliers.company_name, inventory.suppliers.company_country ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 5;
